instructions: Extract the potency/strength/dosage of the primary ingredient from the product title. This is typically expressed as a number followed by a unit (mg, IU, mcg, billion, etc.). ONLY extract potency for the PRIMARY ingredient, not for secondary ingredients.

priority_order.name: Probiotics - Billion CFU
priority_order.reason: Probiotics are measured in billions of CFU (Colony Forming Units)
priority_order.extraction: Extract the number and normalize to just the numeric value (e.g., '50 billion CFU' → '50')

priority_order.name: Vitamins/Minerals - Standard Units
priority_order.reason: Vitamins and minerals use standard supplement measurement units

priority_order.name: Percentage Concentration
priority_order.reason: Some extracts show concentration as percentage

critical_rules: ⚠️  ONLY extract potency for the PRIMARY ingredient (first ingredient in title or multivitamin)
⚠️  Do NOT extract count/quantity - that's different from potency!
❌ WRONG: '60 capsules' → potency: '60'  (this is COUNT, not potency)
✓ CORRECT: '5000 IU vitamin D 60 capsules' → potency: '5000 IU'
⚠️  For probiotics, extract ONLY the billion CFU number without 'billion' word
⚠️  For vitamins/minerals, include the unit (mg, IU, mcg, etc.)
⚠️  If multiple dosages are mentioned, extract the PRIMARY ingredient's dosage
Example: 'Calcium 500mg with Vitamin D 1000 IU' → potency: '500mg' (calcium is primary)
⚠️  If no potency is clearly stated, return empty string ''

examples.title: Nature's Way Fortify Extra Strength Probiotic 50 Billion CFU 30 Capsules
examples.reasoning: Probiotic with 50 billion CFU - extracted numeric value only

examples.title: Vitamin D3 5000 IU High Potency 120 Softgels
examples.reasoning: Primary ingredient (vitamin d3) has potency of 5000 IU

examples.title: Turmeric Curcumin 500mg with Black Pepper Extract 60 Capsules
Fish Oil Omega-3 1000mg (EPA 180mg DHA 120mg) 180 Softgels
examples.reasoning: Primary ingredient (fish oil) total potency is 1000mg (EPA/DHA are components, not separate potencies)

examples.title: Magnesium Glycinate 200mg with Vitamin B6 25mg 90 Capsules
examples.reasoning: Primary ingredient (magnesium) potency is 200mg, B6 is secondary

examples.title: Multivitamin for Women 60 Tablets
examples.reasoning: Multivitamins don't have a single potency value (mix of many nutrients)

examples.title: Prenatal DHA 200mg Omega-3 Softgels 90 Count
examples.reasoning: DHA is primary ingredient with 200mg potency

examples.title: Renew Life Ultimate Flora Probiotic 100B 30 Capsules
examples.reasoning: 100B means 100 billion CFU - extracted numeric value only

edge_cases.explanation: 1000mg is the potency (dosage per serving), 100 is the count (number of tablets)
Extract ONLY the primary (first) ingredient's potency
The potency is 500mg, 95% is the extract standardization (quality metric, not potency)
Formula products without specific potency should return empty string

default_reasoning: No clear potency stated for primary ingredient
